You climb down a slope into a deep canyon. The only way out is to continue forward into the unknown depths of the canyon or return the way you came.

Before you can come to a decision on which way to go, you hear a strange sound from up ahead. You move into cover behind a pair of boulders and strain your eyes to find the source, but you see nothing.
You listen carefully and soon realize that the strange sounds are the sibilant voices of many nāga echoing off the canyon walls.
The echoes from the canyon walls make pinpointing the source of the sounds impossible.
You move deeper into the canyon. You take cover behind brush and boulders when you can, and stick to the shadows when you can't.

You move deeper into the canyon. [SkillCheck 0] trips on a small rock, sending it skittering down the scree-covered slope.

The noises up ahead cease. The canyon becomes eerily quiet.

You hear a sharp hiss above and behind you. You whirl around, and a nāga warrior leaps down from a rock overhead, blocking your path. The nāga falls into a fighting stance and lets loose a piercing, wordless screech.
You move silently from cover to cover, sticking to the deep shadows along the canyon walls.
You leap from your hiding spot and dash through the canyon, intending to meet the warriors in the nāga encampment head-on.
After a few tense minutes of furtive movement, you have a clear view of the source of the sounds. Ahead of you gather several nāga speaking together in hushed, hissing tones.

As you move deeper into the canyon, you trip on a small rock, sending it skittering down the scree-covered slope.

The noises up ahead cease. The canyon becomes eerily quiet.
[Specified 0] guides you forward, leading you from cover to cover, sticking to the deep shadows along the canyon walls.

As you move deeper into the canyon, you trip on a small rock, sending it skittering down the scree-covered slope.

The noises up ahead cease. The canyon becomes eerily quiet.

Through precise timing and careful steps, you are able to sneak through most of the nāga camp undetected.

Ahead of you is a final cluster of nāga, the only thing standing between you and the canyon's exit.
